title: Add hero visual element to LoginPage homepage

requirements.text: Add a hero visual element at the top of the LoginPage component (frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx) before the existing mission text section. The visual should be an abstract community-focused illustration that represents Phil3's philanthropic mission and adds visual interest to the landing page.

quotes: I'll add a hero visual element to the top of the homepage. I'll create an abstract community-focused illustration that represents the philanthropic mission of Phil3.

acceptanceCriteria: Hero visual element is positioned at the top of the LoginPage before the mission text section
Visual uses an abstract community-focused design that aligns with Phil3's philanthropic mission
Image is properly integrated into the existing layout without breaking the current styling
Visual loads as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated

constraints: Do not modify the existing mission text content or structure that was recently updated
Maintain the existing styling and layout of the LoginPage component
Do not change authentication flow or functionality
nonGoals: Modifying the mission text section content
Changing the color scheme beyond the hero visual
Adding interactive elements to the hero visual
Implementing other homepage improvements mentioned in the earlier conversation

required: Abstract community-focused hero illustration representing philanthropy and decentralized community collaboration, featuring connected nodes or figures in a modern minimalist style with warm, welcoming tones (hero-community.dim_1200x400.png)
